name: Winter Lights
description:
Had a winter story in my mind for the game jam and spent some time writing that and composing some music. As not such a big surprise, didn't have enough time to put that together, so here are some bits and pieces from that.

The lights guide you through the wintery scene to find all missing pieces of the music.

Features original soundtrack made during the jam. Visual assets are from various packs from the Unreal Engine Marketplace and Metahuman character made during the jam aswell. Full list of assets in the Game Jam submission page. 

Honoring Game Jam Low Code specs so only blueprints used

Post jam edits: Added title screen for info and ability to exit the game with ESC
